text: Baddies is an American reality television series that premiered on May 16, 2021, on the Zeus Network. It is a spiritual successor to the former Oxygen series Bad Girls Club that aired on from 2006 to 2017. == Timeline of cast members == Main cast members Cast member Seasons ATL South West East
